website_summaries.verdict: Enjoy all the health benefits of a traditional protein bar, without compromising on taste or texture.
pros: The bars are sweet, but include no artificial sweeteners
Multiple flavors to choose from Bars are packed with 20g of protein and essential amino acids
Many of the bars also have crispy rice throughout
cons: Sits at a higher price point than most

customer_reviews.title: New Version is  Terrible
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula now the bars are hard and pasty. Please return to the old version of the bars.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: New recipe is Bad
customer_reviews.text: New recipe is bad. Went from something I'd eat every day to something I will never purchase again. Incredibly dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Product Changed -- Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The version of Clif Bulders Bars - Chocolate Mint being sold in the new packaging is a fundamentally different flavor than what Clif had sold for many years. And it is bad. I am debating whether it is worth the hassle to return the ones I ordered. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not just new packaging. Also tastes disgusting now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened here. These used to be really good. Maybe they got bought out or decided to just cash in on a brand and flavor of previously-good bars by using cheaper ingredients. These bars used to be soft-ish chocolate with a really good mint flavor and little crunchy pieces inside. It tasted almost like eating a thin mint girl scout cookie. The new bars taste like brown wax. They're very stiff and the flavor is pretty nasty now. The new ones taste worse than the old ones used to even after they were a year expired. Try something different. Don't waste your money on these new ones. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Soy protein isolate isn't healthy
customer_reviews.text: Builder bars contain soy protein. When I look for a clean protein supplement, I research how the protein is made and whether it's actually healthy or not. I believe soy protein isn't a healthy choice but Google "how soy protein is made" and make your own decision. There are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serious downgrade from prior version
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe they've replaced oat fiber with inulin from chicory root, the GASSIEST, most miserable 'fiber' option in processed foods. This used to be my go-to breakfast bar, but I won't be touching it again until they remove the chicory. The old formula was great. This formula change is idiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: The old bars tasted and worked great. These new bars are absolutely terrible. i had read the new reviews and thought that maybe some of the review were over-reacting....they were not. Clif Bar has really done poor job with the revamped bars. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Terrible new version
customer_reviews.text: Have been eating Builder bars almost daily for years; the new version is awful: hard (to the point of nearly breaking teeth) and flavor is of fake sweetener and chemicals; ingredients are full of Soy (i.e. estrogen inducing). Canceled my long-standing subscription, though too late as another box was just delivered (and can't be returned); donation to the food bank now I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Some of the worst gas I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the packaging changed. I thought that was all that changed, until I bought a few boxes. Nope, they taste different too. Not as good as before, but not bad. However, I've noticed a terrible side effect... These seem to give me horrible gas. I'm talking about that nasty, rotten food and fecal matter kind of gas. It's bad. If I eat a few of these throughout the day (something I did many times with the old kind), I'm going to feel bloated, and antisocial. I think a couple of coworkers have suffered for it. On the plus side, they're great for getting shocked and disgusted reactions from ex-girlfriends. :)
customer_reviews.author: Guardfather

customer_reviews.title: Old flavor was incredible. Beware of the new recipe!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating one of these a day for the past 6 months or so. They were easily the best tasting protein bar I have had. Then about a month ago when they rebranded the look of the bars, they also changed the recipe for these. Not sure what they added or took out of them, but it completely RUINED the flavor. If you can find the original recipe somewhere, buy those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overpriced but good taste good texture good amount of protein
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the vanilla almond flavor Pros : -Does not contain peanuts -Does not contain chocolate -Low glycemic -non gmo -good taste -good texture ,crunchy - contains 20 gr of protein which is more than other "natural" bars which usually contains 8 to 10 gr Cons : -tad too sweet -grossly overpriced on amazon . i had a subscription only to find out some grocery stores sells those at 0.69c a unit , so now i purchase those at my grocery stores instead .
customer_reviews.author: reshiram

customer_reviews.title: Just awful!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely awful after the formula change. The box is more tasty now. Change it back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, tasty, portable. WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! I've been searching my entire adult life for a snack that is healthy, tasty and portable. Most protein bars have a gross/artificial/too sweet taste profile that I just can't stand. These bars taste GREAT (like a york peppermint patty) and really fill me up. I have one as a mid-morning snack and sometimes have one in the afternoon as well. These keep me satisfied for hours due to the 20G of protein. I can't recommend these enough!
customer_reviews.author: GetOutside2121

customer_reviews.title: Not a good flavor at all!
customer_reviews.text: These taste horrible. I have tried many of the clif builder bars. I like most of them. This flavor was cheap so I figured why not. Well....it will be tough to get down all these bars. yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Val Hower

customer_reviews.title: From a massive high to a massive low
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these bars, but the flavor has completely changed. I will not be buying these bars again until they revert back to the old flavor. I think most people will agree. These now taste like rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass on these. Taste horrible.
customer_reviews.text: These have to honestly be the worst tasting bars ever. No joke.
customer_reviews.author: Headless

customer_reviews.title: They USED to be good
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite protein bar. Not anymore! Whatever they did when they changed the recipe turned into essentially flavorless bricks of hard clay with a hint of mint. Don’t you love it when companies “improve” a once good product? I won’t be buying these again and I recommend anyone else does the same.
customer_reviews.author: Owlboots

customer_reviews.title: Yuck, after the formula change. Bring back the old versions or make them actually better.
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting, but one of the few 20g protein bars wihout offensive animal products. An older version was overly sticky and hard to chew but after the formula change, the line is pretty much ruined. Still 20g of protein but hard to consume and hard to digest. Flavor not good and a real chore to eat.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Tasty calories!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a taste for calories then these may be very acceptable. I was able to eat one after the other without getting sick. They tasted great and were filling. I was able to eat more while feeling less guilty because they have protein. So more or less this was good. This product is probably more appropriate for someone who would just eat one and only "as needed" rather than "as wanted".
customer_reviews.author: NickNameDrSciWayne

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the new taste (Chocolate)
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten one of these bars every morning for years and I do not like the taste of the new bar (chocolate). It now tastes like a powerbar. I will be looking for the old packaging or, after all these years, finding a different product.
customer_reviews.author: brandon miller

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to 'protein' bars, powders, etc.. you generally accept that you're sacrificing flavor for protein content. These are no exception. They don't taste particularly amazing, but they're not disgusting and are edible. The bars I received appeared to have melted a little at some point, then re solidified. They're a bit longer, narrower, and more dense than the regular Clif bars. I got them because they were inexpensive. The primary protein source appears to be Soy; some people care about that, I don't. Might try a different flavor next time if I can find others at ~$15/dozen
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Dry and Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before but I purchased them from a brick and mortar store with a name similiar to Small Tart. I think the box would have tasted only slightly better than these bars. Very dry and no flavor at all. Not sure if it was just a bad batch or not...
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, amazing source of protein, awesome snack!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the source of my weight and muscle gain. I've had a huge problem for years now with weight gain. I worked out 2-3 times a week, running 1-1.5 miles each day and 30-45 minutes of weights and I stagnated at 114.4-114.6lbs (I'm 5'2.5") for ~6 months. I eventually started buying these at Safeway, eating 1 after every workout (with another 15g of protein in Ensure drinks) and I rose to ~120lbs around September It is now the beginning of November and I sit at 131lbs and climbing. Long story short, if you need muscle gain, this is an easy way to do it, if you put in the hard work! The taste is also addicting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: It's good and fills you up with 20 g of protein. With little bites its very satisfying and good tasting. My problem is I cant stop eating them and cant find them on line any more. I first bought a box from Costco and went back for for and found the Mint Chocolate on line at Amazon ,but when I returned its was not available. If you see it somewhere by the case buy a few they are hard to find they sell out so fast.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: At least double the February 2019 price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2- 12 count boxes for $15.58 each in Feb,2019. I was going to reorder but not for new prices starting near $30. They can kiss my a..!
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Different Formula Than Original
customer_reviews.text: These bars USED to be the best protein bars on the market with regard to taste. But since they updated the look and the formula that’s no longer the case. I still enjoy them but the taste is nothing compared to what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Litz

customer_reviews.title: Great, for a while
customer_reviews.text: Like many Protein or meal replacement bars - these taste great initially, but you will grow tired of them. I find that I need to switch between different brands otherwise I get the bland thing going on and will start to get sick of them. But, this definitely will stay in the rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Easily for me
customer_reviews.text: Nom nom nom. Easily for me, the best protein bars on the market. The balance of protein, taste and price is perfect. I often try others but never switch away from Cliff Builders. I am a runner and will eat one right after a long run. For really long runs, I eat one before I head out instead of my usual Cliff Bar. The density helps as I don't want a heavy amount of food and I can't stop and eat. These do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Geek Noob

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The only Protein Bars I have found that I can't even tell they are a protein bar when I eat because they taste so good. I can only buy them locally in Mint+PB combo packs so I get them online now since I like the Mint way better. The Sat Fat is a little higher than I'd like, but I can accept that since it tastes just as good as any completely unhealthy junk food candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, extra protein, and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Much better than the run of the mill granola bars, and the extra protein is a bonus (without tasting like a chalky mess). I run around 20-40 miles per week and try to eat as much protein as I can...and even with Bacon / Chicken I still need more, the bonus is this helps out my sweet tooth! Overall just a good product from Cliff (which most of their products are pretty good anyway).
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy, Sweet, and Salty
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of the chocolate version of this bar but was glad that I took a gamble on the peanut butter version. The crunchy texture and slightly sweet salty finish make this my favorite. These now serve as my morning breakfast for those days where I am running too far behind to make a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Faiz B

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, but gave me sugar cravings.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars for flavor and 5 stars for value for money.. however one star overall because this review is for my personal opinion and experience - I did not have any type of sugar cravings until I started eating these bars. Anything I get that initiates cravings I do not keep in the house so I won’t be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny337

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled, this is a CANDY BAR
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars contain more sugar than they do protein. This is a terrible, terrible way to increase your protein intake.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives me terrible gas but tastes good. But serious sulfur farts.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of sweet, chewy and filling.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this particular flavor in my desk at work in case I'm running late for lunch. I'll have half a bar as a mid morning snack and the other half later in the afternoon. I like this flavor because it is not chocolate and I have an issue with anything chocolate. As others have said, they are dense, I do find them a bit grainy but they are not hard or crunchy. I'm ordering another box now so I'm definitely a fan.
customer_reviews.author: MendelMom

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, nutritous.
customer_reviews.text: Short review. I've bought from them multiple times. It's always sent to me quickly and the flavor is everything. I'm addicted to them. Got a great bulk going and these are a big reason why. If I'm a little short on protein for the day this is a quick 20 grams. Great for post workout as well. Also this is the best price and flavor on Amazon hands down. Thanks for supplying me!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Expensive variety of a great protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: This bar tastes great but is overwhelmingly overpriced compared to its more simplistic and effective flavors. I love the brand but it is still expensive nonetheless when you become tired of the normal, cheaper flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Kantz

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous protein bars, protein shakes etc....and i'm a guy that likes to buy off of reviews. Well the Amazon reviews of this product were spot on. It's is tasty, not bland like other protein bars and very filling. The ONLY thing I would find wrong with them is the shipping because while mine arrived in one piece, you can tell they took on some heat as some of the chocolate was melted to the wrapper...but that would be expected in the Florida sunshine. I eat one for breakfast and one for lunch then a healthy chicken breast dinner. Besides the melted chocolate due to the heat of Florida, ..they are awesome...I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Petergazinya420

customer_reviews.title: CLIF BUILDERS - Protein Bars - Vanilla Almond Flavor - 20g Protein (2.4 Ounce, 12 Count
customer_reviews.text: Great Protein Bars. I Enjoy the flavor and it never get old I prefer Almond Vanilla over there Chocolate flavor. Good Good it helps for my weight loss , suppress my hunger, gives me plenty of proteins. Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.author: MARMO72

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing. They taste great and the amount of protein they provide in exchange for that flavor is mind-boggling. My personal favorite is chocolate mint - it is basically candy. Proteinaceous candy. Sure there are other bars that provide more protein and/or are cheaper, but they cannot hold a candle to these in terms of flavor. If you're looking to gain weight (healthy weight, of course) or looking for a protein bar that could legitimately serve as a meal replacement, look no further. If you're trying to lose weight, however, these may not be the bars for you. They are called builders, not breakers, after all.
customer_reviews.author: G-Funk

customer_reviews.title: Change made a good product into a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Since Clif changed ingredients to gluten free, the price increased. Quality/ taste is now very poor. What used to be a good protein bar now sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mem

customer_reviews.title: New recipe is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The old recipe was one of the best tasting protein bars out there. This new recipe is complete garbage. They shouldn’t have changed it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: phedgepath

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are so good!! it's difficult to describe how good these are! They are high in calories, but beat a candy bar of any kind, in nutrition, ingredients, being organic, all natural, no sugar... They make a great treat, meal replacement.. I eat them when I crave something sweet and chocolatey, or on days when I think I may need some more protein (I am mostly vegan). There is no "aftertaste" like many protein and vitamin filled bars.. They are kind of "light", not overly gooey or chewy.. a bit of a crunch... great alone, or with some water, juice, smoothie, or even sliced thinly and put on a plate with some fruit, cheese, or ice cream... amazing product.!
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: The mint chocolate and cookies & cream are delicious! Super convenient and satisfying. I definitely prefer these to the regular clif bars given the higher protein content. They run a little dry but nothing compared to most dry af protein bars
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor I've tried yet for a great bar.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying various flavors of the CLIF builder bars for at least half a year now. I've been pleased with all the flavors along with a modest amount of sweetness. Many of these bars overcompensate and I would have trouble stomaching anything as sugary as a candy bar. I branched out to the Chocolate Mint flavor and I think this might be my favorite yet. The taste is spot on, like I'm eating an Andes mint in protein bar form. Across the board I've enjoyed using the builder bars to get protein in on the go and I'll definitely be continuing my subscription to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P

customer_reviews.title: Not what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the box appearing to be unopened, however once opened there were only 4 protein bars inside. All of the protein bars had been opened as well. I'm very disappointed and will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: RPeden219

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite flavor so far and I haven’t gotten sick of ...
customer_reviews.text: I basically eat these when I have to run and have no time for breakfast. This is my favorite flavor so far and I haven’t gotten sick of the flavor in like ten years. They temporarily satisfy your hunger until you have time to eat a full meal. The protein keeps me going!
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: The King of Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: The best protein bar there is. Others with double the calories (sugar) can taste great as well, but this project is clearly high quality compared with other fly-by-night supplement companies. It also tastes excellent....I'd rather have this than most any candy bar. We refrigerate them to enhance the consistency and it only makes them better.
customer_reviews.author: HighExpectations

customer_reviews.title: Tastes okay, not great, but okay
customer_reviews.text: Offers a good amount of protein at 20g per serving. The taste isn't all that great. It's tolerable and okay at best. 5/5 for the amount of protein provided, 3.8/5 for the taste.
customer_reviews.author: houler

customer_reviews.title: 12-Bar Box Only had 4 bars in it?!?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three 12-bar boxes of Cliff bars (3 different flavors). Two boxes came with 12 bars arrived with 12 bars as expected. The Chocolate Mint box, which seemed unopened, only had 4 bars in it. Whoever packed the shipment, human or machine, should have noticed it was considerably lighter than the other two boxes. Amazon said product is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: BostonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Cookies'n Cream bars not up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: While I have tried MANY flavors of Clif's Builders Bars---and given large boxes as gifts, the FLAVOR of these Cookies'n Cream bars are not to my personal liking. I expected something sweet---like Cookies'n cream ice cream, but these bars have an over-taste of Coconut, a flavor I do not enjoy. That is MY personal problem: anybody who loves coconut will LOVE these particular bars!!
customer_reviews.author: George Felder III

customer_reviews.title: I personally love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating these for breakfast for over a year now. They don't have any of the chemical tastes that some other bars have, and I like the mint, it is just right. I like the texture too, it is not heavy and not too chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gau

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: 12 bars for $20 isn't bad but other flavors are cheaper so the value gets 4 stars. Everything else is 5 stars. Best tasting protein bars we have ever had. Will definitely be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Nalani

customer_reviews.title: I like these bars
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars. Pretty much all the flavors. For a dollar a bar, that's even better. I ordered 2 boxes and they will be gone way before the expiration date. They are high in carbs. 29 grams and only 2 grams of fiber so I wouldn't eat no more than 1 a day. I'm not buying quest bars just to get high fiber. I can eat fiber. With 20 grams so Soy Protein and not Whey or Casein protein, I can relax being vegan and not worry about animal proteins being in the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a protein product that doesn't bother my reflux. Happy. Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I have acid reflux, so most protein drinks bother me and I can't have anything with chocolate. Well, that cuts out 95% of protein drinks and bars. This bar does the job and I love the taste. I have one a day, work out 3-5 times a week and noticed big muscle gains of an extra 5 lbs after a few weeks. Normally extra protein is the only way I can gain weight to I'm ecstatic that I found something.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Robb

customer_reviews.title: I love these protein bars but the current method of shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars but the current method of shipping is not working. It is now October and my bars still arrived all melted inside their wrapper. I would recommend buying somewhere else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Better than a candybar
customer_reviews.text: What a great bar to take to work! Im on my feet 10 hours a work day and sometimes my bloodsugar wants to drop and protein is the key! One of these packs so much that within a short time i feel energetic again. Yep! I always have these in the cupboard and in my lunchbag!
customer_reviews.author: Prondlee

customer_reviews.title: Great bars - melted chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars, they taste great and are filling. I ordered a case last winter and they arrived in perfect condition. The case I ordered this summer arrived with the chocolate all messed up inside the wrappers, causing my lap to receive chocolate sprinkles whenever I carelessly open one up. I'm assuming it's because it shipped in a normal truck, it was hot in there, and the chocolate melted. Next time I will probably try to order a case through my local grocer, since their items come via climate controlled trucks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Recieved original version
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the new packaging but I received the old packaging. expired . I like the original version well enough . Have not compared to see what changed besides the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ijw

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These have come in the box. They are a good flavor, like actually quite decent tasting. They are gluten free. My kids take them to school or on the go.
customer_reviews.author: HLSC

customer_reviews.title: Horrible New Taste - What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I was a customer for 10 years - no longer - I am moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leslie

customer_reviews.title: New formula :(
customer_reviews.text: Not only did they change the packaging, they changed the formula. Used to be 5 stars but now they're just not quite as good. Still eat them on the regular, but just miss the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Novel flavor, consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the only nutrition bars that don’t make my allergies flare. Sometimes they are a bit grainy but the flavor makes up for it (a glass of milk is good, too)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: sickly sweet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I like the chocolate - peanut butter flavor, and I thought this would be similar. Sadly they are not. I can't even get through a single bar, let alone a case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste
customer_reviews.text: I work in fitness and I always keep a couple of these bars in my gym bag for when I'm on the go (which is almost always). They're great for post workouts and between meals. I'm a huge fan of the peanut butter and vanilla almond flavors. They taste great, they keep me full, and they're pretty high in protein.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bars in the business!
customer_reviews.text: These bars have the best flavor for any mint chocolate loving human like myself. It also contains a high amount of protein that will refuel you after a workout. I eat these bars twice a day to keep my protein count high and to keep my hunger down throughout the day. These are great and I would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent W.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Protein bars are the perfect solution for those of us that can't cook the five meals everyone suggests. However, I had a hard time finding a protein bar that had a decent taste and would not break the bank if consumed almost daily. This protein bar comes at a decent price and it is definitely the best tasting bar I have ever tried. You almost can't tell if it's a protein bar or a candy bar. Not everything is perfect and yes, this bar is not short on fat and carbs, but it's not that bad if you're bulking up. I would not have it if you want to cut down that body fat.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Poveda

customer_reviews.title: Was a great deal until is changed
customer_reviews.text: I was paying about $15 for a 12 pack, that source seems to have dried up, there is no way I will pay double for the same item. Overall, these are one of the few protein bars that are palatable.
customer_reviews.author: TomOinGburg

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bar out there
customer_reviews.text: I have the cliff builder bars on auto refill, my favorite is the peanut butter it’s the perfect amount of sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura foster

customer_reviews.title: Great (for non-whey protein)!
customer_reviews.text: It’s tough to find a good protein bar without whey but these have a decent flavor and I’m happy with the nutrition facts/ingredients making this a reasonably healthy snack on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I eat this brand of nutritional protein bar twice a day ,but not seen this particular flavor by ClIF, in either Walmart or Smart & Final food departments until I found it here on Amazon. I have tried most all of the Protein bars on the market and I like this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a good meal replacement bar, too heavy for a snack bar. On busy work days its my breakfast. A few easy changes could make it a 5 star bar. First I think its a tad too sweet, cut back a little on the sugar. You could probably do this just by reducing the coating, which IMO is to thick, and candy like. This bar doesn't do well in hot weather, again the coating is the issue. A little more fiber and less saturated fat would be nice. I like the taste, but calling it crunchy is a stretch. Overall one of the best "protein" bars out there. But IMO not 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: MGunz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good
customer_reviews.text: If it was not for the 20 grams of sugar it would be the perfect protein bar. It tastes delicious but with this much sugar is like you are eating a snicker.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Jesus Rondinelli

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tasting protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: I found these bars at a local walmart and have been in love ever since. I originally bought them to add some extra protein to my muscle building diet. I have had bad experiences with some protein bars in the past, mainly the met RX bars, as tehy taste terrible and dry. Now they do have an extra 12g of protein per bar, but to me, getting the 20G in the Clif bar with an awesome taste is a much more worthwhile experience. I definately recommend these if they fit your nutritional needs, and I promise you wont be disapointed with the taste :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Monaco

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein bar for pre-workout and sweet cravings
customer_reviews.text: If you have a sweet tooth, crunchy peanut butter and vanilla almond has the best taste and texture out of all the cliff builder's bars. I use them as pre-workout snacks 1 hour before my training session as well as a treat if I'm craving anything sweet. Pros: - Great tasting bars (depending on the flavor you choose) - Provides consistent energy for your workout (as long as you time it correctly) - Closest thing to a candy bar with protein Cons: - Tastes amazing, so you want to eat more :)
customer_reviews.author: Uzunlar

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, though they taste like the old C-ration chocolate discs, which most GI's complained as tasteless...
customer_reviews.author: S-3

customer_reviews.title: Delicious bars
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars taste so good, the peanut butter flavor is my favorite. One bar fills me up to get by in-between meals.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Awais

customer_reviews.title: I love dark chocolate so there take care of that craving ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great-tasting bars. I love dark chocolate so there take care of that craving without excessive fat and with a good shot of protein. I eat one every day, usually after a workout or bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: rcl

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome meal replacement bars but I end up eating them between meals also. Sometimes 2 or 3. I gave a few boxes to my mom and she also had the same problem... They are too good if there is such a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: Good bar to mix it up
customer_reviews.text: I use these bars as in between meal snacks and usually as a lunch replacement. I get the chocolate, peanut butter mixed box at a local store but that was getting old and I wanted some new flavor. The Cookies and Cream did the trick. This bar has a good flavor, a bit weaker than what I expected but none the less I will be getting more. I have seen some reviews that stated the bars had past their expiration dates, mine and all of the other bars that I have ever got from Amazon have been well with in the expiration dates.
customer_reviews.author: OuterLimits

customer_reviews.title: Need to offer options
customer_reviews.text: Why not offer more flavors with the same deal we have on these on subscription deal. I love mint chocolate but geeesh how about offering variety.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: New recipe = not as good
customer_reviews.text: Is it just me or they changed their recipe? It used to taste great but now it tastes ultra chalky. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tarek Fadel

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and Cream Flavor isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Cliff Peanut butter / Chocolate is worlds ahead of cookies and cream in terms of flavor, but this is still far better than a lot of 20g protein bars on the market that taste like play doh.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Switched from Gatorade to these
customer_reviews.text: Dig the bar, less like a glorified candy bar. I do wish they were a bit bigger, but overall, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Great Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: These are like York peppermint patties but better, and filled with protien, making for a great breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: derek kreykes

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious. I wish you got a little more for the money, but you are paying for a high quality, tasty bar. I still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. I'm not going to speak to the nutrition of them as they have facts you can read about that. All I will say is the flavor is great. It's still a protein bar so it's not super soft like a candy bar but I gladly eat this as a snack if I have nothing else and i look forward to them in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: MrBrojenglz

customer_reviews.title: I love clif builder bars but the box I ordered had ...
customer_reviews.text: I love clif builder bars but the box I ordered had cleary been exposed to excess heat and the chocolate coating melted and set again. This make it look unpleasant and the chocolate coating flakes off everywhere making it very messy to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Dorkjock

customer_reviews.title: Good bar
customer_reviews.text: I use these bars as in between meal snacks and usually as a lunch replacement. I get the chocolate, peanut butter mixed box at a local store but that was getting old. I was a bit skeptical about the vanilla almond as I am not a fan of almonds but this bar is great, I do not find a strong taste of almond. I have seen some reviews that stated the bars had past their expiration dates, mine and all of the other bars that I have ever got from Amazon have been well with in the expiration dates.
customer_reviews.author: OuterLimits

customer_reviews.title: One of my 2 favorites.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy I stumbled upon trying this at a random store and was pleasantly surprised at the delicious taste. It was so hard to find anywhere else so I had to have it. It's a vanilla yogurt like coating on the outside but very good. My other favorite is the mint chocolate. Amazing! Both great for a post workout or snack on the go if you have an active lifestyle. And if you like regular Clif Bars, I recommend oatmeal raisin walnut, blueberry crisp, and carrot cake.
customer_reviews.author: tyroo

customer_reviews.title: Not the best taste, Very chewy.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a harder texture. It has a crunchy cookie part but it also has a chewy section. Its not terrible tasting but for its price I would go for a One bar or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Efren

customer_reviews.title: Y u m.
customer_reviews.text: Price is high but I eat one for lunch daily so it all works out.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best protein bars I've found. Great taste and very satisfying. Great for on-the-go when you're not sure you'll be able to grab a meal (eat half, then the other half a couple hours later), but don't leave them in the heat as they will melt. I store them in the fridge. I am diabetic and eat half prior to a workout and the other half post-workout. One bar will keep me satisfied for a good 4 or 5 hours. They are 7 points on Weight Watchers.
customer_reviews.author: Klaren

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Bars
customer_reviews.text: Great for lunch or snack throughout the day. Best flavor they have.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Villien

customer_reviews.title: They are nice, but they have too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, but they have too much sugar... a lot of these protein bars are replacing the sugar with lower calorie sugar-alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Price doubled?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for years, and they're fine, but for whatever reason the price is now almost exactly double what it was just a few months ago for a box of 12. Guess it's time to find a new standby peanut butter protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: sdf

customer_reviews.title: Box Tampered With?
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar for the taste AND 20g of protein. Unfortunately, the pack of 12 only had 11 bars, and one of them was not in a wrapper. I did notice a tear in the box, but since that was in a shipping box, I didn’t think anything of it. I know you can’t control EVERYTHING, but this was disappointing. Now I’m afraid to order it again. LL 10.18.18
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked this brand
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked this brand, and this sub-brand, and especially this flavor. Amazon had a very decent price and It was convenient for someone who can't always get to a store. I need the bars, as someone who when they work the shorter shifts (four or five and Half hours) as opposed to the long shifts only gets one 15 min break.
customer_reviews.author: Dovegirl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vegan protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Clif Builder bars are my favorite vegan protein bar, and these are the best flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Dahlbacka

customer_reviews.title: Simply delicious and nutritious!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I used to have to go from store to store in a tri-county area to swipe these off the shelves!! These are THAT GOOD, plain and simple. I didn’t want to write a review because I didn’t want people buying this off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

product_meta.title: CLIF BUILDERS - Protein Bars - Chocolate Mint - 20g Protein (2.4 Ounce, 12 Count) (Now Gluten Free)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate MintYou’re a worker. Whether it’s in the gym or on the jobsite, you’re constantly building and striving for something great. That's why we made CLIF Builders protein bars with 20 grams of complete protein and essential amino acids to help repair and build muscle. And because we make every ingredient count, you don’t have to sacrifice taste or texture to get all the benefits of a protein bar that works as hard as you.
feature_bullets: Chocolate and protein don’t get any cooler than this tasty, well-earned reward
NEW LOOK. SAME 20g PROTEIN: CLIF Builders protein bars have a bold new look. If the amazing new designs aren’t in your delivery, they will be soon
ENERGY FOR WORKING OUT OR WORKING HARD: 20g of complete protein with essential amino acids to help build and repair muscles whether you’re in the gym or on the job

FAVORITE FLAVORS FOR THE WIN: CLIF Builders protein bars have newly designed wrappers, but we didn’t change any flavor. They remain a tasty choice for anyone looking for a protein boost with a winning texture
HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS: CLIF Builders protein bars are now gluten free. That’s right, and they’re made from non-GMO and low-glycemic-index ingredients for prolonged levels of energy

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
